subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: With one more victory, Herb Magee, a basketball coach at Philadelphia University, will break a tie with Bob Knight for most career N.C.A.A. wins in men’s basketball.
snippet: With one more victory, Herb Magee, a basketball coach at Philadelphia University, will break a tie with Bob Knight for most career N.C.A.A. wins in men’s basketball.
